Headline: #100 Jeffery Manor Express Temporary Reroute at Yates/98th
ShortDescription: 100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Jeffery, Van Vlissingen, and 100th due to, street blockage at Yates/98th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, Jeffery, Van Vlissingen, and 100th due to, street blockage at Yates/98th.

Allow extra travel time.
